name: x-accuracy-3
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s accuracy by three stages. This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Raises accuracy by three stages in battle. Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text.black_white: It drastically raises the accuracy of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It drastically raises the accuracy of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
